Name: Bob's Journey
About the game: Bob's Journey is An original adventure game inspired by the jokenpo rules (Wood to Paper, Stone to self, and Metal to Scissors) Unlock weapons Use Enemy to destroy items Regenerate nearby items Base material for tributing Features Unlock weapons to destroy scenario items such as (trees, columns, scaffolds, blocks, and enemies) Unlock shield to defense by enemy attack and dodge blocks to solve single puzzles Collect materials such as (wood, stone, and metal) for crafting(weapons and shields) and advance in the map Regenerate raw materials through the map (tree, column, scaffold, blocks) and keep gameplay self-sufficient A tribute system, exchanging part of life by materials, and vice-versa A secret menu in pause game to set some cheats
